content.body: Noam Rosenthal: I am fixing https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/blob/cff0ff1898/resource-timing/SO-XO-SO-redirect-chain-tao.https.html#L56-L61 for Firefox. I wonder which redirect should cause the TAO check to fail?

content.body: is it because the last redirect from `cross-origin` to `same-origin`?
content.formatted_body: is it because the last redirect from cross-origin to same-origin?

is it because the last redirect from cross-origin to same-origin?

content.body: I am asking because in Firefox, the TAO check is done by always againsting the origin that started the load
